# Setup

```{r packages}
#devtools::install_github("EcoDynIZW/d6projdata")

sapply(list("sf", "tidyverse", "raster", "here", "ggplot2", "patchwork", "d6projdata", "mapview", "cowplot"), 
       library, character.only = TRUE, logical.return = TRUE)
```

# Data

```{r data}
data_name <- d6projdata::proj_data_name()

data <- st_read(list.files(here::here("data-raw", ""), pattern = ".$", recursive = TRUE, full.names = TRUE)[[1]]) %>% 
  
names(data)
nrow(data)

head(data, 10)
#min(data$timestamp)
#max(data$timestamp)

mapview(data[1,])
```

# create proj data file

```{r}
proj_data <- d6projdata::build_data_files(path = "data-raw")
# proj_data <- readxl::read_xlsx(here::here("data-raw", ""))
```

# move data

```{r}
d6projdata::fun_move_raw(taxon_col = "", # maybe change to another column or type by hand
                         data_path = list.files(here::here("data-raw", ""), pattern = ".$", recursive = TRUE, full.names = TRUE)[[1]])
```

# save data

```{r}
st_write(data, here::here("data-raw", data_name, paste0(data_name, ".gpkg")))
```

# render data

```{r}
d6projdata:::render_projdata(path = here::here("data-raw", data_name),
                data_name = data_name,
                data_sf = data,
                proj_data = proj_data)
```
